eLTER getActivity function

Source: R/getActivity.R
getActivity.Rd

This function allows to obtain the info of activity (actually only title) provided in DEIMS-SDR.

getActivity(activityid)

Arguments

activityid

A character. It is the DEIMS iD of activity make from DEIMS-SDR website. More information about DEIMS iD in this page.

Value

The output of the function is a `tibble` with main features of the activity make in a site.

Author

Alessandro Oggioni, phD (2020) oggioni.a@irea.cnr.it

Examples

getActivity(activityid = 'https://deims.org/activity/8786fc6d-5d70-495c-b901-42f480182845')

#> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8.
#> 
 Found 1 records...
 Imported 1 records. Simplifying...
#> # A tibble: 1 x 1
#>   title                                                                
#>   <chr>                                                                
#> 1 Study of non-indigenous (alien) species in the Mar Piccolo of Taranto
